description: Garlic mushrooms and artichoke hearts make a delicious, earthy filling for this quick puff pastry tart.
keywords: Vegetable pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Artichoke & Mushroom Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Heat the butter and oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the mushrooms for 5 minutes, stir in the garlic, parsley and artichokes and cook for 2 minutes.
Roll out the puff pastry into a large rectangle and score a border of 1cm. Spread the mushroom and artichoke filling in the middle of the border and season with black pepper.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until puffed up and golden.
